SourceProxy.label: LAS Reader
SourceProxy.name: LASReader

Documentation.long_help: Read LIDAR data in LAS format

SourceProxy.Documentation: The LAS reader reads LIDAR data saved using the LAS file format. This reader uses the libLAS library. It produces a vtkPolyData with point data arrays: "intensity": vtkUnsignedShortArray, "classification": vtkUnsignedCharArray (optional) and, "color": vtkUnsignedShortArray (optional)

StringVectorProperty.name: FileName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the file name for the LAS reader.
